    Student Information

    Secure student data management and enrollment systemsLearn More >

    PowerSchool SIS

    Comprehensive Student Information System for securely managing student data, attendance, and grades across K-12 schools.

    Enrollment

    A solution simplifying student enrollment and registration processes for schools and districts.

    Enrollment Express

    Streamline digital forms and workflows to make enrollment processes faster and easier.

    Ecollect Forms

    Customizable forms for gathering data from students, parents, and staff.

    Special Programs

    A tool for managing IEPs, 504 plans, and other specialized student programs with compliance tracking.

    Predictive Enrollment Analytics

    Enrollment forecasting to assist in resource planning.

    Personalized Learning

    Lesson planning, learning management, and assessmentLearn More >

    Schoology Learning

    A leading Learning Management System (LMS) supporting curriculum delivery and collaboration between teachers, students, and parents.

    Performance Matters

    A leading assessment platform to deliver and grade assessments and analyze student performance and growth.

    Curriculum & Instruction

    Build, manage, and analyze standards-aligned curriculum maps and lesson plans.

    ContentNav

    Manage, organize, and access a complete library of high-quality, district-approved content tagged to standards and common metadata.

    Student Success

    Attendance, behavior, and academic intervention managementLearn More >

    MTSS

    A single solution allowing educators to identify and track student needs, communicate with stakeholders, and monitor progress from one location.

    Attendance Intervention

    Tools to monitor and improve student attendance and reduce chronic absenteeism.

    Behavior Support

    Solution to manage and track student behaviors and foster a positive learning environment.

    College, Career & Life Readiness

    College planning, career exploration, & life skills developmentLearn More >

    Naviance

    A comprehensive platform for college, career, and life readiness, empowering students to explore and plan for their futures.

    Talent Recruitment & Retention

    Hiring, staff development, and performance managementLearn More >

    SchoolSpring Job Board

    A recruitment platform connecting schools with top educator talent.

    Applicant Tracking

    Tools to streamline the hiring process, from application to onboarding.

    Employee Records

    Digital record-keeping for employee information and compliance.

    SmartFind Express

    A substitute management system ensuring staff coverage.

    Perform

    Performance evaluation tools for teachers and staff.

    Professional Learning

    Flexible, online platform simplifying professional learning management, tracking progress, and inspiring educator growth.

    Coaching & Mentoring

    Streamline your coaching process and boost teacher retention with our AI-powered platform.

    Resource Planning

    Budgeting, payroll, and resource management for district operationsLearn More >

    Allovue Allocate

    K-12 budgeting software that streamlines funding plans, tracks spending, and optimizes resources.

    Allovue Manage

    K-12 financial workflows to simplify spending management for school leaders, enabling real-time tracking and adjustments.

    Allovue Budget Suite

    Comprehensive K-12 budgeting tools to allocate, manage, and track school and district funds effectively.

    Atrieve

    A workforce management solution for payroll, HR, and operations.

    BusinessPlus

    A financial management platform for school districts.

    eFinancePlus

    Tools for managing school district finances and payroll efficiently.

    Data, Analytics & Insights

    Analytics, data visualization, and embedded toolsLearn More >

    Student Analytics

    Analytics tools for a complete picture of your schools, classrooms, and students.

    Risk Analysis

    Early warning system using predictive analytics to identify students at-risk of missing graduation.

    Student Readiness Analytics

    Insights to track student preparedness for college and careers.

    Talent Analytics

    360-degree views of staff learning, staff needs, and data analysis to support recruitment and retention strategies.

    Continuous Improvement Plans

    Tools to help you create, track, and collaborate on school improvement plans.

    Connected Intelligence

    Data-as-a-Service to transform how schools collect, store, manage, and utilize data to improve educational outcomes while ensuring AI readiness.

    MTSS

    A single solution allowing educators to identify and track student needs, communicate with stakeholders, and monitor progress from one location.

    Communication

    Secure messaging, alerts, and a centralized portal for stakeholdersLearn More >

    MyPowerHub

    A centralized hub for school and district updates, collaboration, and stakeholder engagement.

    Communicate

    Messaging solutions for school-to-home communication.

    SecureFile

    Secure document sharing for schools and parents.

    SafeArrival

    A tool for managing student attendance notifications.

    Presence

    Website and content management solutions for your school.

    Artificial Intelligence

    AI-powered tools and assistant for everyone in educationLearn More >

    PowerBuddy for Assessment

    AI tools within Performance Matters to help educators quickly create and manage personalized, high-quality assessments for students.

    PowerBuddy for College & Career

    AI assistant within Naviance that provides personalized support to students, simplifying career exploration and postsecondary planning.

    PowerBuddy for Community

    AI assistant deployed on districts' public websites to answer questions instantly, improving stakeholder engagement.

    PowerBuddy for Data Analysis

    AI assistant to democratize data analysis by enabling educators to explore and visualize data using natural language.

    PowerBuddy for Engagement

    AI assistant for MyPowerHub providing instant, accurate answers to parents' common questions, saving time and strengthening school and home communications.

    PowerBuddy for Learning

    AI-driven assistance within Schoology Learning to support creating and delivery quality learning experiences and personalized student support.

Personalized Education for Every Journey

Bringing together the full picture of each student’s unique needs, PowerSchool helps you support every step of the K-12 learning journey.

Explore Our Solutions Login

Join us for EDGE 2025, our flagship user conference happening this summer in Nashville, TN!

Making an Impact in Schools and Districts

Tomball ISD (TX) Epic Charter Schools (OK) Colorado Springs School District 11 (CO) Volusia County Schools (FL) NorthPointe Christian Schools (MI)

"At the end of the day, that personal human touch is what it’s all about. It’s about utilizing the tools we have and empowering students to tap into their inner innovative spirit, so they’re better prepared for whatever the future holds."

Dr. Martha Salazar-Zamora

Superintendent of Schools

Listen to the Podcast

"When it was something students didn’t understand, we could pop it into PowerSchool PowerBuddy, and they could ask it questions like, ‘Can you make this a little more simple for me to understand?’ It really leveled the playing field. They were able to do grade level work at a level they understood."

Dinese Millspaugh

Special Education Teacher

Watch Epic’s Video

"I absolutely appreciate that PowerSchool is building AI into Schoology Learning, which is the resource our students use the most. It can be a place where immediate help and information can be accessed right away by students."

Brent Urban

HS Spanish Teacher

Explore PowerBuddy for Learning

"PowerSchool Connected Intelligence K-12 has been nothing but transformative and enhanced our ability to support schools by helping us automate processes that provide schools with actionable information to inform instructional planning and support."

Dr. Angel R. Teron

Coordinator of Research, Evaluation, and Accountability

Read Volusia's Story

"In the past, we had solutions that were limited, and we had to fit into their mold. PowerSchool’s integration allows us to work more efficiently and to maintain better data, which helps our students and parents have a better overall experience."

Nicole Crawford

Technology Director

Watch Northpointe’s Video

Connecting the Central Office to the
Classroom to the Home Around the World

Countries

United States

As a leading provider of cloud-based K-12 education software in North America, PowerSchool knows the importance of understanding state-specific regulations, solving students’ and educators’ unique challenges, and supporting the needs of the local community.

Learn More

Canada

PowerSchool provides districts and school boards throughout Canada with interoperable technology that works for them, including student information management, provincial reporting, online registration, gradebook, learning management, assessment, special/inclusive education, HR, finance, payroll, and student services. 

Learn More

Middle East & Africa

PowerSchool supports digital modernization for schools throughout the Middle East & Africa—including with PowerSchool in Arabic with comprehensive translation, right-to-left user interface orientation, and the Hijri calendar. 

2024 Global Education Insights Report: Middle East 

Learn More

Latin America

PowerSchool supports digital modernization for schools throughout Latin America with a secure platform built to centralize access to comprehensive data and increase student achievement with AI-driven personalized education. 

Case Study: Ceibal’s Journey of Advancing Digital Learning Across Uruguay 

Learn More

India

PowerSchool elevates student success and school operations for over 2 million students throughout India with trusted solutions such as Neverskip ERP and Schoology Learning. 

Press Release: PowerSchool’s Strategic Expansion in India 

Learn More

Europe

PowerSchool supports digital modernization for schools throughout Europe with a secure platform built to centralize access to comprehensive data and increase student achievement with AI-driven personalized education. 

Learn More

Asia-Pacific

PowerSchool supports digital modernization for schools throughout Asia-Pacific with a secure platform built to centralize access to comprehensive data and increase student achievement with AI-driven personalized education. 

Learn More

Ministries of Education

PowerSchool has the experience and ability to scale that Ministries of Education require to ensure security, data accessibility, AI-driven personalized education, and overall life readiness for students at a country-wide level. 

Case Study: Ceibal’s Journey of Advancing Digital Learning Across Uruguay 

Learn More

Private International Schools

PowerSchool supports private international schools worldwide with a secure platform built to centralize access to comprehensive data and increase student achievement with AI-driven personalized education. 

Flyer: PowerSchool for Private International Schools
